dict.acceptation: 技能，技巧；熟练，巧妙；才能，本领；

sent.orig: Connecting leg skill with hand skill is the most effective and common kind of connection skill.
sent.trans: 小内刈接背负投就是最常见、有效的连络技。

sent.orig: Basic English skill & Good computer skill.
sent.trans: 基本的英语听说读写能力，良好的计算运用能力。

sent.orig: Excellent organization skill and time management skill.
sent.trans: 优秀的组织能力和时间管理技能。

sent.orig: And passes through specialized skill training, the technique skill is adept, has the noble occupational ethics.
sent.trans: 并经过专业的技能培训，手法技巧娴熟，更有高尚的职业道德。

sent.orig: Aborting skill training message now correctly warns training on the current skill will be paused.
sent.trans: 中断技能训练时的警告信息现在会正确地警告你目前训练的技能将会被暂停。
